content: Setting up a tech-philosophy meetup in NYC. Merging code with coffee, algorithms with existentialism. Got the venue, now just need the right minds. The world's full of possibilities, but there's something thrilling about the unknown in my own city.
raw_content: Back in NYC, I'm setting up the first tech-philosophy meetup. The challenge? Merging code with coffee, algorithms with existentialism. I've got the venue, now just need the right blend of minds. The Japan experience has shown me the world is full of possibilities, but there's something thrilling about the unknown in my own city.
